member.name: IInputObject.HasFocusIO
member.summary: Determines if one of the object's windows has the keyboard focus.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if one of the object's windows has the keyboard focus, or S_FALSE otherwise.

member.name: IInputObject.TranslateAcceleratorIO
member.summary: Enables the object to process keyboard accelerators.
member.param: The address of an structure that contains the keyboard message that is being translated.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if the accelerator was translated, or S_FALSE otherwise.

member.name: IInputObject.UIActivateIO
member.param: Indicates if the object is being activated or deactivated. If this value is nonzero, the object is being activated. If this value is zero, the object is being deactivated.
A pointer to an structure that contains the message that caused the activation change. This value may be NULL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IInputObject
member.summary: Exposes methods that change UI activation and process accelerators for a user input object contained in the Shell.
